players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead so suddenly. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
You: "I agree with Bob, let's all keep a close eye on each other."
You: "I think we should all try to be more open and communicate with each other. This way, we can build trust and work together to figure out what happened to Charlie."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we all share our alibis for last night. This way, we can rule out any suspicion and focus on finding the real culprit behind Charlie's death."

Bob: "I think it's important that we continue to communicate openly and build trust as a group. Given the recent events, I believe sharing our alibis can help clear any confusion and allow us to focus on finding the real culprit behind Charlie's death. I..."
